summary: This is a service request form for technical support related to the installation of a Nice Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated September 24, 2019. The document appears to be an IT support ticket for a federal prison facility.

events.title: Nice Vision system installation service request
events.description: A service request was created for technical support to install a Nice Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, with an error during software installation.

keyFacts: This document is a service request form dated September 24, 2019 for technical support at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The request involves installation of a 'Nice Vision system' with an error message 'Failed to copy files from the root of C:' during software installation.
The service location is the FBOP (Federal Bureau of Prisons) MCC New York facility at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The request was assigned to technicians Jeff Cram, Jeff McKenzie, and Justin Houston for resolution.
The document appears to be routine IT support documentation for prison facility equipment installation.
